Name: Clan Wolf-In-Exile
Details: Clan Wolf-in-Exile is a splinter faction of the original Clan Wolf. Born from the destruction of the original Clan Wolf in the Refusal War, the Wolves-in-Exile continue to uphold the Warden traditions of their forebears under the leadership of Khan Phelan Kell by siding with the Inner Sphere. Despite being Abjured by the other Clans, the Exiles continue to maintain their claim to the Wolf name and uphold their interpretation of the Clan way of life.
